typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'MASTER_FN_POSITION_V1',
	schemaName: 'SCD',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> snowflake
snowflake sink(input(
		Country as string,
		Age as string,
		Salary as string,
		Purchased as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
